mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.state AS "state", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.product_ip AS "productIp", a.source_ip AS "sourceIp", a.status AS "status", a.account AS "account", a.time AS "time"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dept_login( id, state, dept_id, parent_id, product_ip, source_ip, status, account, time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{state}, #{deptId}, #{parent.id}, #{productIp}, #{sourceIp}, #{status}, #{account}, #{time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dept_login SET state = #{state}, dept_id = #{deptId}, parent_id = #{parent.id}, product_ip = #{productIp}, source_ip = #{sourceIp}, status = #{status}, account = #{account}, time = #{time} WHERE id = #{id}
